name: The Beginning
description: A decorative badge. Earned by obtaining your first log.

name: Wooden Age
description: After chopping quite an amount of logs, the merchant decides to buy your wood for a higher price.

name: Nature Killer
description: You chopped so many trees, it's actually quite surprising the Earth hasn't collapsed from the lack of photosynthesis.

name: Metal Acquired
description: A decorative badge. Earned by obtaining your first iron.

name: Iron Age
description: Everyone wants iron. With that in mind, you now sell it for even a higher price.

name: Iron Man
description: Do you ever wonder where these iron ingots come from?

name: Diamond!
description: A decorative badge. Earned by obtaining your first diamond.

name: Diamond Hunter
description: After mining quite an amount of diamonds, you now know the strategy to greatly improve your chance of finding diamonds.

name: Full Diamond
description: Now that you have all the diamonds in the world, what do you do now?

name: Hidden in the Depth
description: A decorative badge. Earned from getting Ancient Debris.

name: Heavy Metals
description: After mining quite an amount of Ancient Debris, you now know the strategy to greatly improve your chance of finding Ancient Debris.

name: Netherist
description: That's a lot of effort to mine all these debris. Maybe I'll reward you with this badge. Looks cool with the Netherite right?

name: Into Fire
description: A decorative badge. Earned by obtaining your first blaze rod.

name: Firefighter
description: Did you know snowball is effective against blazes? Yea no one cares anyway, Power V Bow go brr.

name: Sudden End
description: All of a sudden you died! This is a compensation for that. At least now you know you can die in here.

name: Staph Dying!
description: You died so many times, the bot has to give you a mercy on lowering your death rate a bit.

name: How are you still sane?
description: Actually how?

name: Local Brewery
description: A decorative badge. Earned from brewing your first potion.

name: Alchemist
description: After brewing for a while, you find a way to optimize the materials so you can produce 1 more bottle!

name: Mad Scientist
description: You brew potions for so long, you can produce 2 more bottles out of the existing recipe. Crazy.

name: Potion Master
description: You know potions in the back of your hand. This allows you to use 1 more potion.
